response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its high value and quality, we believe it's worth $120 to you. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I would like to extend this opportunity to you at an introductory price of $110. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find this proposal attractive and decide to make the purchase. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Thank you for considering our product!", "product_price": 110}
